pushpanath jayasiri mallikarachchiaarthika sanwardhana amathya basil rajapaksha mahathage manga penwima anuwa diwayina pura elawalu, palathuru, waga kirime wyapruthiyata samagamiwa ‘pansalen gamata’ wada piliwela yatathe sama pansalakama osu uyan bihikirime nawa wadasatahanak arambae.janadhipathi karyalaye sambandhikaraka ‘pansalen gamata’ wyapruthi adhyaksha shasthrawedi kotapola mangala himiyan ge ha janadhipathi upadeshaka bengamuwe nalaka himiyange anudanumin kananke hinguru pannala wiharasthana bhumiyen palamu osu uyana arambaimata katayuthu yodagena yayi.athithaye merate deshiya aushadha wagakirima bahula washayen sidu kerunu namuth ada eya simasahitha wimen deshiya wedakamata wadi athi maru pahara gana janathawa ha pasal daruwan danuwath karalimata wishesha wadapiliwelak arambaimata awadhanaya yomuwa athayi bengamuwe nalaka himiyo pawasuha.mathara disthrikkaye pansal bim 50 k pamana danata me sandaha thoragena athi athara akkara kalakata aasanna idamwala aushadha wagakirimata aadhara dimata rajaye awadhanaya yomu wi athayi unwahanse pawasathi.
